## host.Api.refresh() method

Refresh the host in the native app. When being called in the native app, this action will refresh the modal browser window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refresh(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```
sdk.host.refresh();
```
